gt_text: 开学必备礼包. 为新学期做好准备！ 5件必备好物，低至5美元内！ 学生最爱,限时折扣
juding_criteria:
Here is a list of every concrete visual element the final image must contain:

*   Main title text: "开学必备礼包" (in Chinese characters)
*   Lettering for main title: bold white chalk-style
*   Placement of main title: centered at the top of the poster
*   Student character
*   Full backpack
*   Notebooks
*   Colorful pens
*   Snacks
*   Calendar marked "September"
*   Classroom chalkboard in the background
*   Subtle doodles on the chalkboard
*   Motivational quotes on the chalkboard
*   Small banner (positioned above the main title)
*   Text on banner: "为新学期做好准备！"
*   Font for banner text: hand-drawn yellow
*   Callout (positioned below the main title)
*   Text on callout: "5件必备好物，低至5美元内！"
*   Colors for callout: red text on a white background
*   Brand logo (positioned in the top left corner)
*   Text phrase "学生最爱" (at the bottom of the poster)
*   Text phrase "限时折扣" (at the bottom of the poster)
*   QR code for direct shopping (at the bottom of the poster)
